statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData WHERE loyal_customer = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM CustomerData ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase_date FROM CustomerData WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData WHERE loyal_customer = TRUE AND email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, total_purchases FROM CustomerData WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM CustomerData WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' OR phone_number LIKE '666%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, AVG(total_purchases) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM CustomerData WHERE loyal_customer = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.purchase_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT benefit_name, description FROM benefits WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount >= 500 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, join_date FROM customers
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, join_date FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01'
